attributes.action: Help raise awareness of problems faced by men such as homeless and suicide rates
attributes.additional_details:
Male suicide rates are 3 times higher in the uk and the group most likely to commit suicide are men aged 40-44 (Samaritans.org)

In 2015 71% of the homeless were men (telegraph)

domestic abuse on men is an often overlooked problem

I feel that these are the main issues and more should be done to address these problems and raise awareness with education in schools, outreach programs, and places for men to come forward with out the stigma of embarrassment or shame.
attributes.background:
I feel that awareness should be raised for issues affecting men.
Male issues aren’t as widely known or addressed by society and I feel the following problems should be made more known and more should be done to prevent them.
